DOC.brief_summary: This study retrospectively assess effect use balance hydroxyethyl sctarch ( HES ) 130/0.4 balance crystalloid solution pump prime intraoperative fluid therapy risk early acute postoperative kidney injury adult cardiac surgery patient .
DOC.brief_title: HES Acute Kidney Injury Adult Cardiac Surgery
DOC.criteria: Age ≥ 18 yo Having pump cardiac surgery CHU Liège April 2013 June 2014 Off pump surgery Use Blood Albumin cardiopulmonary bypass prim solution Preoperative dialysis
